H0.text: What do the Americans call what we call a 'sofa'. Couch

H1.text: What do the Americans call what we call a 'sofa'. Settee

H2.text: What do the Americans call what we call a 'sofa'. Loveseat

H3.text: What do the Americans call what we call a 'sofa'. Davenport

A4.text: Couch is predominantly used in North America.

A5.text: The terms sofa and settee are most commonly used in the United Kingdom and India.
